channel.title: [317] Making Command [317]
channel.description:
Hi. So yeah, I need help adding a command on a 317 server. I want a command that it changes automatly your combat level, without getting any skill.
And also another that you put the id of level and the level you want ;D
I hope any1 can help me, really, help is very appreciated. (Ill rep++, with my brothers forum acc)

item.title: [317] Making Command [317]
item.dc:creator: @1pure1337 1pure1337
item.description:
@1pure1337 wrote:

Here you go :).

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

E.G ::combat 150

This make you level 150 if you do ::combat 40 after that it gives you level 190 it just keeps adding up also the max level to go to is 255.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Making Command [317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("cb")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 2) { int newcblevel = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if (newcblevel <= 126 && newcblevel >= 3) { combatLevel = (newcblevel); updateRequired = true; } else { sM("The Combat Level Is Too High Or Too Low!"); } }

Read full topic
